content: Mobai says spring is the season for fresh, delicious vegetables. {A疑惑}But that begs the question—which season is all about meat?

content: Things that annoy me about spring? {A心虚目移}...{短暂停} It's shedding season.

content: In spring, when the petals drift down from the trees, I always get the urge to...{短暂停} {A两眼放光}swipe at them with my paws!

content: I love sitting at the top of a mountain, {A笑眯眯}especially in spring, when the wind on the mountaintop has that wild and warm quality to it.

content:
If you can't find me in summer,
it's 'cause I might be soaking in the river, even though I hate water.
{A失落}...but it's just too hot, bhan!

content:

Glenn won't let me, says it's bad for his heart.
